ComicInfo.Title: The Secret Diary of Bettie Page, Chapter Five: Those!
ComicInfo.Summary:
You know that thing where your flight back to NYC is interrupted so you can be debriefed at a secret government base, only to find that base under attack by giant radioactive monsters? And you canâ€™t get another flight back home until you defeat the giant radioactive monsters? Sucks, right? But our Bettie can handle it.
